location: Huayin Street, Datong District, near Taipei Main Station and Zhongshan MRT
notes: Large 3BR/2BA apartment on 10th floor with elevator, described as elegant with good natural lighting. Move-in ready with full appliances including washer and fridge. Cooking allowed with natural gas. Has balcony (check railing safety for baby). Prime location near two MRT stations. No pets allowed.
